verses.roman:
yadyapi svatantra prabhu nahe nivāraṇa
bhakta-icchā vinā prabhu nā kare gamana

synonyms: yadyapi—although; svatantra—fully independent; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nahe nivāraṇa—there is no checking Him; bhakta-icchā vinā—without the permission of devotees; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nā kare gamana—does not go.
translation: Although the Lord is completely independent and incapable of being checked by anyone, He still did not go without the permission of His devotees.
